name: Ternium S.A.
description: Ternium S.A. is a leading steel manufacturer based in Latin America, primarily serving the Mexican and South American markets. Founded in 2005 and headquartered in Luxembourg, Ternium operates modern steel plants in Mexico, Argentina, Brazil, and Guatemala. The company specializes in the production of a wide variety of steel products, including flat and long steel, which are used in various industries, such as construction, automotive, appliances, and energy. Ternium is committed to sustainability and strives to minimize its environmental impact through efficient production processes and the use of advanced technology. The company emphasizes innovation and quality, ensuring that its products meet the highest standards required by its customers. With a strong focus on customer service and a diverse product portfolio, Ternium aims to be a reliable partner in the steel industry, contributing to the development of infrastructure and industrial projects across the region. As part of its strategic vision, Ternium is also investing in research and development to enhance product offerings and improve operational efficiency. The company’s mission is to provide high-quality steel solutions while fostering a sustainable future for the communities it serves.
